Ithandles the submission process with a configurable Call for Participation, thereviewing and selection of submissions, and the scheduling and releasehandling. After the event, ``pretalx`` allows speakers to receive feedback,upload their slides, and organisers to embed recordings.Read our `feature list`_ on our main site to get a better idea of what`pretalx` can do for you, but it typically involves everything you'll need tocurate submissions and contents for a conference with several tracks andconference days.You can host pretalx yourself, as detailed in our `administratordocumentation`_, or use our public instance at `pretalx.com`_.
